name: Farrellart_2023
description:
An Interactive Fine Art Portfolio showcasing over 20 years of professional artwork for corporate and private clients and public exhibitions.

I have created an Unreal 5.1 immersive space where the viewer can freely roam around a virtual museum to view a wide range of original paintings, drawings, and digital artwork. For these artworks, it is important to see the work in the context of its painterly evolution,  scale, and impact on the viewer. I am also developing an interactive studio where viewers can interact and see new work in progress. A handy addition for clients who commission artwork to view its development.

This project is constantly evolving. I hope you enjoy the work so far.

Chris Farrell

Instagram: @farrellartist
